trends: There have been no other sightings in Edgewater Park
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsme,my wife and kid and next door nieghbor were outside. above the trees we noticed a bright light(like a star). then all of a sudden, a bright light shown down like a police helicopter. it lasted about 10 - 15 seconds. we didnt hear any sound and didnt see any object in the sky. The light was brighter on the outer edges and darker in the center, almost like an upside down V. about 10 minutes later, I noticed what looked like a star moving across the sky from south to north. my wife thought it might be a plane. it was very high and was not blinking and the light stayed consistant the whole time. About 20 minutes after that I saw the same light traveling the same direction. the brightness or the shape of the light did not change as it went across the sky. We never heard a sound from any of these objects.
